name: The sum of all positive even 3-digit numbers of the array
instruction:
Write a function `sumEvenPositive3digitNum` that takes one parametre - an array.

The array is of arbitrary length and consists of positive and negative integers.

The function should return the sum of all positive even 3-digit numbers in the array.

An example of running the function:
```javascript
sumEvenPositive3digitNum([100, 200, 300, 400]) // 100 + 200 + 300 + 400 = 1000
sumEvenPositive3digitNum([101, 203, 305, 407]) // 0
sumEvenPositive3digitNum([2, 20, 200, 300, -400, 40]) // 200 + 300 = 500
```
